A4.text: The 1998 season was the Minnesota Vikings' 38th in the National Football League (NFL), and their season ended when they were upset by the Atlanta Falcons 30–27 in the 1998 NFC Championship Game.

A5.text: The 1998 Vikings were the first NFL team to compile a regular season record of 15–1 and not reach the Super Bowl.

A6.text: They had a conference championship loss in 2009 when they were nearly in range of a game-clinching field goal before Brett Favre threw an interception.

A7.text: They had a conference championship loss in 2017 when they followed up the 'Minneapolis Miracle' with the 'Minneapolis Massacre'.
